item.name: SAHOOL Satellite Service | خدمة الأقمار الصناعية (Port 8090)
item.description:
⚠️ DEPRECATED - Use vegetation-analysis-service instead. Multi-provider satellite monitoring with automatic fallback. Supports Sentinel Hub, Copernicus STAC, NASA Earthdata. Includes Sentinel-1 SAR for soil moisture estimation. Now with GDD (Growing Degree Days) tracking for 40+ Yemen crops.
خدمة الأقمار الصناعية - Sentinel-2, Landsat, MODIS Integration
